programme.title: hora de lutar contra Zabuza outra vez, e agora ele est acompanhado do ninja rastreador. Os dois reparam as habilidades de Sasuke, e ele percebe o imenso poder do ninja mascarado. Sasuke e o ninja se preparam para lutar, como se o destino os chamasse.

programme.desc: Naruto: As Armas Conhecidas Como Shinobi

programme.desc: Naruto: O Demnio Na Neve

programme.sub-title: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke

programme.sub-title: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam

programme.sub-title: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Comea

programme.desc: Naruto: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada
programme.sub-title: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada

programme.sub-title: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte

programme.desc: Naruto: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta
programme.sub-title: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta

programme.sub-title: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda!

programme.sub-title: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Drago

programme.sub-title: A Promessa Do "Sobrancelhudo": Amor Eterno E Proteo

programme.desc: Naruto: Formao De Batalha: Ino-Shika-Cho

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011, Action)

programme.title: Tudo por Justia, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: Russell, um operrio da fbrica, tenta proteger seu irmo mais novo, Rodney, de todos os perigos. No entanto, quando este desaparece, Russell decide resolver o problema por conta prpria.

programme.title: Sem Perdo, (2013, Action)

programme.title: Fim da Linha, (2016, Drama)

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Encontro Com Destino
programme.desc: A equipe kakashi encontra itachi uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Kakashi diz a todos para no olharem nos olhos sharingan de itachi. Kakashi se prepara para enfrentar itachi sozinho e pede que naruto d cobertura.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Crescimento De Naruto
programme.desc: Guy lamenta sua asneira ao ver seus trs alunos presos pela priso de gua.determinado a parar kisame, guy o desafia usando o nunchaku, sua arma favorita. um super taijutsu contra uma super fora humana.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esfera Secreta De Chama
programme.desc: Vov chiyo e sakura salvam naruto do genjutsu de itachi.no mesmo instante, kakashi comea um contra-ataque. Uma batalha ninja de nvel alto comea e kakashi exibe toda sua destreza e percio usando uma ttica sutil.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Do Jinchurik!
programme.desc: Seus inimigos derrotados, kisame e itachi, parecem ter sido clones, cujos poderes e aparecimento foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Morte Do Gaara
programme.desc: As equipes kakashi e guy fazem uma pausa.vov chiyo observa naruto cochilar e lembra de sasori quando criana.

programme.desc: As equipe kakashi e guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki. Eles correm para se infiltrar mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. O nico jeito de quebrar a barreira removendo os cinco selos de uma s vez.
programme.sub-title: Postura Ttica: Operao Entrada Em Gancho!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e agora a equipe guy enfrentam cpias idnticas de si mesmos numa batalha.no esconderijo dos akatsuki, deidara e sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki de nove caudas.
programme.sub-title: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Hiruko Contra Duas Kunoichi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Verdadeiro Rosto De Sasori
programme.desc: Vovchiyo e sakura conseguem expor sasori, que incrivelmente no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos.chiyo fica ainda mais chocada com o segundo boneco que sasori revela.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades Secretas De Chiyo
programme.desc: Sakura pega pelas tticas de sasori e fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno. Mas ela usa uma papel bomba para se livrar da fumaavenenosa. Ela resolver se arriscar a capturar sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre o paradeiro de orochimaru.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pai E Me
programme.desc: A maior vantagem dos bonecos criados de humanos que ele pode assumir o comando do jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo.consequentemente, o boneco do terceiro kazekage tem ahabilidade especial de converter chakra em poder magntico.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage
programme.desc: Sakura revida oataque da areia de ferro do boneco do terceiro kazekage com uma fora sobre-humana. Ela aprendeu com tsunade que a habilidade mais importante de um mdico ninja se evadir um ataque.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto secreto que ela tomou. Sakura explica a uma surpresa vov chiyo que esse antdoto converte o veneno em protena e funciona durante mais ou menos trs minutos.
programme.sub-title: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!
programme.desc: Sakura e vov chiyo esto enfrentando uma batalha feroz contra sasori, onde ele pode se tornar um boneco humano. Elas derrotam sasori dentro do prazo, mas ele acaba revivendo.
programme.sub-title: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossvel
programme.desc: Embora tenha sido envenenada, vov chiyo usa o ltimoantdoto em sakura. Zombando da terna cena entre vov chiyo e sakura, sasori tenta por fim vida de vov chiyo. Mas vov chiyo revida e derrota sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Feras Ressuscitadas!
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta desesperada de sakura e vov chiyo, enquanto enfrentam suas cpias.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kakashi Iluminado
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar naruto com a vov chiyo, que est sofrendo com o veneno. Os membros da equipe guy correm paraajudar a equipe kakashi. Enquanto isso, com as preparaes completas, kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento
programme.desc: Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora est sob a superviso de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega aldeia aps uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki est de volta!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado
programme.desc: Jiraiya traz notcias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ao. Naruto e Sakura propem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivncia. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnervel. As tentativas de seus companheiros so inteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mos de Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso
programme.desc: Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Orochimaru fala para Boruto e Sakura sobre o Sbio da Cobra Branca que vive na Caverna Ryuchi. No caminho, os dois so confrontados pela Equipe 10.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos descobrem que, para se encontrar com o Sbio da Cobra Branca, precisaro passar por uma srie de testes.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O Sbio da Cobra Branca pede que Boruto traga para ele uma "Escama Invertida" de Garaga, uma cobra problemtica.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e companhia trabalham juntos para conseguir a Escama Invertida de Garaga, mas a batalha se mostra difcil, uma vez que Garaga tem o poder de sentir a localizao dos inimigos e transform-los em pedra.
programme.sub-title: Um inimigo feroz: O ataque cruel de Garaga!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mitsuki vai para a terra natal de Kokuyou e Sekiei, o Pas da Terra.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Em vez de voltar para casa com Boruto, Mitsuki fica com Kokuyou.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto est ferido, inconsciente e no pode mais continuar. Todos pensam em voltar para a Aldeia da Folha.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Determinados a encontrar Ohnoki, a equipe se infiltra na aldeia sem saber que est sendo observada.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A equipe encontra Ohnoki, mas ele se recusa a ajudar. Para piorar a situao, eles so atacados e acabam se separando.

programme.desc: No meio do caminho para o ponto de encontro, Boruto e Ohnoki se deparam com o Campo de Treinamento da Aldeia da Pedra.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Para conseguir sair da barreira, Boruto busca desesperadamente pelo corao de pedra, mas no o encontra.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Ohnoki leva Boruto a um lugar especial para explicar sua opinio sobre do futuro, opinio essa formada aps a perda de Kozuchi, seu neto.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Kakou usa um Estilo Partcula raro e poderoso, levando Boruto ao limite.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Sarada so pegos e levados de volta para a base da Aldeia da Pedra junto com Ohnoki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Kirara aparece e transforma Boruto e Sarada em "fantoches". Em seguida, ela ordena que os dois se matem.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Surpreso e confuso com as aes de Mitsuki, Sekiei o ataca de forma imprudente.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Honest Thief, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Wanting to lead an honest life, a notorious bank robber (Liam Neeson) turns himself in, only to be double-crossed by two ruthless FBI agents.

programme.title: Henry's Crime, (2010, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Released from prison for a crime he didn't commit, an ex-con targets the same bank he was sent away for robbing. Starring an ensemble cast including Keanu Reeves ("John Wick").

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: Pusher, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: Filled with easy money, fast cars, and beautiful women, Frank's life as a drug dealer is perfect until the police catch him en route to deliver a large bag of heroin.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: Fled, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: A witty and fast-paced Action Adventure, Fled tracks two prison escapes on the lam as they race against time to find a hidden cache of cash and an incriminating computer disk that could either bring down the Cuban Mafia or get the two killed.

programme.title: Sukiyaki Western Django, (2007, Western)
programme.desc: In this action-packed Western, a nameless gunfighter arrives in a town ripped apart by rival gangs and, though courted by both to join, chooses his own path.

programme.title: Yakuza Apocalypse, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: Fearsome yakuza boss Kamiura is also a bloodsucking vampire. One day, men arrive from a competing clan and deliver him an ultimatum: Play nice or die. Kamiura refuses and, during a fierce battle, is torn limb from limb.

programme.title: The Babadook, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a mother must protect her son from an evil, supernatural entity that has escaped the pages of a children's book and is lurking in their home.

programme.title: Hereditary, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: When the matriarch of the Graham family passes away, her daughter (Toni Collette) and grandchildren begin to unravel cryptic and increasingly terrifying secrets about their ancestry, trying to outrun the sinister fate they have inherited.

programme.title: Goodnight Mommy, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: In the heat of the summer. A lonesome house in the countryside between woods and cornfields. Nine-year-old twin brothers are waiting for their mother.

programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a mother must protect her son from an evil, supernatural entity that has escaped the pages of a children's book and is lurking in their home.

programme.desc: When the matriarch of the Graham family passes away, her daughter (Toni Collette) and grandchildren begin to unravel cryptic and increasingly terrifying secrets about their ancestry, trying to outrun the sinister fate they have inherited.

programme.title: Goodnight Mommy, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: In the heat of the summer. A lonesome house in the countryside between woods and cornfields. Nine-year-old twin brothers are waiting for their mother.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Adventure)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Unforgettable, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: A forensics expert is thrust into a heart-stopping adventure when he takes an experimental memory drug in the hopes of discovering his wife's murderer.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Romance)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Truman doesnt realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Paul Newman earned an Oscar nomination plus Best Actor honors from the National Society of Film Critics and New York Film Critics Circle for his portrayal of Sully, a likeable working stiff whos made a lifetime of bad decisions.

programme.title: The Commitments, (1991, Music)
programme.desc: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

programme.title: Little Man Tate, (1991, Drama)
programme.desc: A single, working-class mother can't give her musically, scientifically and emotionally gifted 7-year-old son the support and stimulation he needs--and neither can the director of a school for exceptional children, who takes him under her wing.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Romance)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: Rockers, (1978, Documentary)
programme.desc: Night Flight Presents: Starring Leroy 'Horsemouth' Wallace and Richard 'Dirty Harry' Hall; ROCKERS is a story of oppressed Jamaican musicians getting even with the 'mafia types' in the business

programme.title: Brannigan, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: Marathon Man, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman plays the likable graduate student and marathon runner of the title, unwillingly trapped in a killing game of intrigue involving a Nazi fugitive, Christian Szell.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: Saint Jack, (1979, Drama)
programme.desc: Jack Flowers, an American hustler in early 1970s Singapore, dreams of building a fortune by running a brothel and returning to the States to lead a life of luxury.

programme.title: Joe (1970), (1968, Thriller)
programme.desc: Anti-hippie Joe (Peter Boyle) finds a kindred spirit in Bill Compton (Dennis Patrick) who boasts that he killed a drug-dealing hippie (Patrick McDermott). When a news report confirms the incident, vigilante justice is set in motion.

programme.title: Last Embrace, (1979, Drama)
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, Harry Hannan (Roy Scheider) hires a private investigator to help him find the identity of the stalker who is sending death threats, but it only leads to more questions as the killer gets closer and closer.

programme.title: Lenny, (1974, Comedy)

programme.title: Love and Death: Love and Death, (1975, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: The Rainmaker, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn garnered an Oscar nomination as the "plain yet magnetically beautiful" tomboy rancher, with Burt Lancaster brilliantly cast in the role of the smooth-talking con man.

programme.title: Sam Whiskey, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Welcome to America's Wild - and very wacky - West! Burt Reynolds, Clint Walker, Ossie Davis and Angie Dickinson star in this tongue-in-cheek tale of love, lust and larceny as an amiable con-artist is hire by a sexy widow to break into the U.S. Mint.

programme.title: El Dorado, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum plays to perfection an alcoholic but gutsy sheriff who relentlessly battles the dark side of the wild West, ruthless cattle barons and crooked businessmen.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Seeking a fresh start, Bat Masterson (Joel McCrea) rolls into Dodge City with a chip on his shoulder and a gun on his hip. But soon, his mysterious past will catch up with him when an old friend calls in a favor...one that might cost him his life!

programme.title: The Cowboy And The Indians, (1949, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry runs in to opposition when he tries to aid starving Navajos. The Chief is found unconscious and his necklace gone. Lakohna, the successor, is blamed. Gene and Lakohna join to seek justice.

programme.title: Beyond The Purple Hills, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry becomes the new Sheriff after bank robbers kill the former sheriff. When Judge Beaumont is murdered, evidence points to the judge's wild son. Believing the young man, Gene tries to help.

programme.title: Cow Town, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Barbed wire is brought to the open range in a secret plan is to bring sheep into the territory, and the ranchers are urged to fight against it. Gene Autry makes certain that nothing shady is going on.

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches, (1981, Western)
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join whats left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gangs heyday may be far behind them, but theres still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: The Lovely Bones, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer.

programme.title: Almost Famous, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

programme.desc: Ryan (George Clooney) flies all over for work, but after meeting a passenger he learns that life isn't about the journey, but the connections we make along the way.

programme.desc: From the director of SUPERBAD comes a coming-of-age comedy of big dreams, hysterical consequences, and young love, set in a run-down amusement park.

programme.title: 2000. O Going Merry roubado por Nami, e o confronto pelo Baratie tem um intervalo. Mas a ao continua em alto mar, quando Zoro desafia Mihawk, Olhos de Gavio, em um duelo! Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: Mihawk Olhos de Gavio! O Espadachim Zoro Deriva!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E24

programme.title: 2000. A batalha pelo Baratie continua, com Zeff e os cozinheiros contra o bando de Krieg. Luffy e seus companheiros se unem luta, mas as coisas no esto fceis! Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: O Despertar dos Chutes Implacveis! Sanji vs. Pearl, a Muralha de Ferro!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E25

programme.title: 2000. Sanji recorda sua infncia, como aprendiz de chef a bordo de um navio atacado por Zeff Perna Rubra! Quando o jovem Sanji fica deriva, o prprio terrvel capito que o resgata. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: O Sonho de Zeff e Sanji! O Mar dos Sonhos, All Blue!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E26

programme.title: 2000. Enquanto a batalha pelo Baratie segue fulminante, Luffy se v forado a tomar aes drsticas, e Gin reflete sobre sua lealdade. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: Um Homem Demonaco e Sem Corao! Gin, o Comandante de Batalha da Frota Pirata!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E27

programme.title: 2000. O temvel Don Krieg parece ter vantagem em seu combate com Luffy. Para tentar evitar o prancha, o homem de borracha muda sua estratgia. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: No Morrerei! Luffy vs. Krieg - A Concluso!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E28

programme.title: 2000. O confronto de Luffy e Don Krieg sofre uma reviravolta a favor do bando do pirata de chapu de palha, quando seu capito decide se concentrar em destruir o armamento do inimigo. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: O Resultado de Uma Batalha Mortal! Uma Lana Feita de Determinao!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E29

programme.title: 2000. Com Don Krieg derrotado, Luffy tenta convencer Sanji a juntar-se ao seu bando. O habilidoso cozinheiro tem interesse no convite, mas tem algo a provar antes de seguir em frente. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: A Partida! O Cozinheiro do Mar e Luffy Viajam Juntos!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E30

programme.title: 2000. Com seu novo integrante e de estmago cheio, Luffy e seu bando seguem em busca de Nami, que est indo ao encontro de um inimigo mortal! Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: O Homem Mais Perigoso de East Blue! Arlong, o Homem-Peixe!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E31

programme.title: 2000. Zoro capturado pelo Homem-Peixe Arlong e descobre o chocante segredo de Nami. Incapaz de acreditar no que ouviu, ele decide colocar a navegadora prova. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: A Bruxa da Vila Cocoyasi! A Oficial de Arlong!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E32

programme.title: 2000. Luffy e os demais seguem ao Arlong Park para o confronto com seu proprietrio. No caminho, descobrem um mapa do tesouro que levanta questes sobre Nami. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: A Morte de Usopp?! Luffy Ainda No Chegou?
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E33

programme.title: 2000. Uma calorosa discusso sobre a lealdade de Nami divide o bando e s uma coisa certa - ningum quer arriscar a vida por traidores. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: Reunidos! Usopp Conta a Verdadeira Histria de Nami!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E34

programme.title: 2000. A irm de Nami, Nojiko, revela detalhes da infncia da habilidosa cartgrafa. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: O Passado Secreto! A Lutadora Bell-mre!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E35

programme.title: 2000. Nojiko continua a histria da infncia de Nami. No presente, a ladra tenta alcanar um objetivo iniciado h muitos anos, mas a traio a espreita no horizonte. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: Sobreviva! Bell-mre, a me e famlia de Nami!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E36

programme.title: 2000. Nezumi confisca o tesouro de Nami, mas a mando de quem? E Nami, a quem est aliada, e o que far nesta situao? Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: A Interveno de Luffy! Uma Promessa Quebrada!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E37

programme.title: 2000. A confiana do bando em Nami restaurada, e agora hora para o confronto final! Luffy e os demais esto decididos a fazer Arlong pagar! Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: Luffy em Problemas! Os Homens-Peixe vs. Os Piratas de Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E38

programme.title: 2000. O bando de Luffy e os Homens-Peixe de Arlong esto engajados no combate, e a situao desanda quando Luffy cai em uma armadilha nas guas. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Junji Shimizu
programme.sub-title: Luffy Afoga! Zoro vs. Hatchan, O Polvo!
programme.desc: One Piece - T01E39

programme.title: Bad Boys II

programme.title: BMF

programme.title: Laurence Anyways
programme.desc: In the 90s, Laurence tells his girlfriend, Fred, that he wants to become a woman; they confront the prejudices of their friends, ignore the council of their families and brave the phobias of the society they offend. Starring Melvil Poupaud, Suzanne Clement, Nathalie Baye.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: A colleague vanishes amid unexplained disappearances in Normandy, France; Magnus and her team run into a military blockade during their investigation.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: With no sanctuary in sight, Helen and Will find themselves living suburban lives that neither of them recognize.

programme.desc: A government agent tries to get an Inuit man and his children to move to settlement housing. Starring Kim Bodnia, Apayata Kotierk, Benjamin Kunuk.

programme.title: Drink Slay Love
programme.desc: A 16-year old vampire discovers she has the ability to withstand sunlight. Sensing an opportunity to round up new victims, her family enrolls her in high school, where her who-cares attitude quickly makes her the coolest girl around. Starring Cierra Ramirez, Angelique Rivera, Gregg Sulkin.

programme.title: The Grand Seduction
programme.desc: Residents of a small fishing community in Newfoundland charm a doctor into becoming the towns full-time physician in order to secure a vital factory contract. Starring Brendan Gleeson, Taylor Kitsch, Liane Balaban.

programme.title: Wonder

programme.title: The Games Maker

programme.title: Lion
programme.desc: Accidentally separated from his family as a child, Saroo Brierley (Dev Patel) returns to India 25 years later to find them. Starring Dev Patel, Rooney Mara, David Wenham.

programme.desc: An unexpected bond begins to form between a man trying to rebuild his life and a young woman promising to help him reunite with his estranged wife. Starring Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry rediscover the Black Mecca of Atlanta; both brothers learn that the process of breaking into the scene in Atlanta will not be as easy when they are met with the old guard who wants to retain.

programme.title: Sanctuary

programme.desc: In order to prevent him from altering or destroying the future, Magnus uses Adam Worths time portal to pursue him to 1898 London.

programme.desc: A criminal (David Suchet) blackmails young people (Ryan Reynolds, Kristin Booth) who plot high-tech robberies into stealing $30 million. Starring Ryan Reynolds, David Suchet, Kristin Booth.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: As Hollow Earth Abnormals continue to arrive at the surface in droves, Will, Henry, Kate and Bigfoot scramble to prevent war with the Lotus Security Forces; they worry about the whereabouts and safety of Magnus who was last seen heading to Praxis.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: With a government inspector threatening to cut off the Sanctuarys funding, Magnus and Will must explain a failed mission.

programme.title: Born to Be Wild

programme.desc: European explorers change the lives of an Inuit community while exploring the Arctic in 1922. Starring Leah Angutimarik, Natar Ungalaaq, Peter-Henry Arnatsiaq.

programme.desc: Yo-Yo hops in the kitchen to prepare a special meal for her special guest; she invites her fiance, Kelvin, over to fix one of his favorite meals; its a meal that they both love.

programme.desc: Michael is thrilled when the children start their own businesses after squandering their allowances in one day.

programme.desc: Michael tries to get his always-tardy family dressed and out the door to a wedding within just 15 minutes.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Road Trip
programme.desc: A family trip to Paul Reveres house tests everyones nerves.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Double Date
programme.desc: Michael agrees to let Claire go on her first date with Tony, but only on condition that it is a double date with Janet and himself.

programme.title: Hustle, Sizzle, and Smoke - Steak and Sweet Onion
programme.desc: The competition grows fiercer as Chef Rachelle of Rachelles Creative Dishes squares off against Chef Ohh. With Steak and Sweet Onion as the ingredients, our competitors must dish out sweet and savory meals. Who will secure a chance to continue?

programme.title: Hustle, Sizzle, and Smoke - Salmon and Kale
programme.desc: Get ready for a seafood showdown! Chef Melody of Serenita Homestead grills it up against Chef Don of Carsons BBQ.

programme.title: Hustle, Sizzle, and Smoke - Rib Tips and Apple
programme.desc: Chef Stanzee of Cupcakes Kitchen battles it out against Chef Adrian of DaMunchies ATL; featuring rib tips and apples, the competitors must delicately balance two different flavors to impress the judges with their dishes.

programme.title: Hustle, Sizzle, and Smoke - Catfish and Polenta
programme.desc: Southern staples, catfish and polenta, are on the menu today; Chef Jazurri throws down against Chef Ohh with a trip to the semifinals on the line.

programme.title: In Sickness and in Health
programme.desc: Faith falls ill two weeks before she is going to marry Norman; secrets start to flare up and the couple realizes that love and sacrifice go hand-in-hand.

programme.title: Back to the Goode Life
programme.desc: A successful New York banker goes from being boss to being broke after she is wrongfully accused of unethical banking practices.

programme.title: Family Time - Its a Grey Area
programme.desc: Tony is upset when he discovers a grey hair and Lisa is amused.

programme.title: Family Time - The First Rule of Fight Night Is You Do Not Talk About Fight Night
programme.desc: Tony hosts fight night with his friends on the same night as Lisas dinner party.

programme.title: Family Time - The Will
programme.desc: Tony and Lisas family argue over who should take custody of their children if something happens to them.

programme.title: Family Time - No New Friends
programme.desc: When an old friend of Tonys moves into the neighborhood, the Stallworths realize things arent exactly as they seem.

programme.title: Family Time - Hospitality
programme.desc: Lisa invites Tonys godparents to stay for a few nights but no one can get them to leave.

programme.desc: Bernie has to put his foot down after Mr. Diggs, Vanessas teacher, persuades her to become a vegetarian.

programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: The Running Man (2025)
programme.desc: Desperate for money to save his sick daughter, Ben Richards joins the top-rated show on television, "The Running Man," a deadly competition where contestants must survive 30 days while being hunted by professional assassins.

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: Recurring nightmares of the planet Mars lead a confused earthling into the center of an intergalactic conspiracy.

programme.title: White House Down (2013)
programme.desc: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

programme.title: Unhuman (2022)
programme.desc: Seven misfit students must band together against a growing gang of unhuman savages. Their trust in each other gets tested to the limit in a brutal, horrifying fight to survive as they take down the murderous zombie creatures.

programme.title: G.I. Blues (1960)
programme.desc: A singing GI (Elvis Presley) forms a combo in Germany and bets his buddies he can charm a cabaret dancer (Juliet Prowse).

programme.title: My Dead Boyfriend (2016)
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) goes on a manic quest to learn the truth about her boyfriend after she finds him dead on their couch.

programme.title: The Fortune Cookie (1966)
programme.desc: A TV cameraman hurt while covering a football game is told by his brother-in-law how to get a big insurance settlement.

programme.title: An Inconvenient Truth (2006)
programme.desc: Former presidential candidate Al Gore campaigns to raise awareness of the dangers of global warming and calls for immediate action to curb the problem.

programme.title: The Wasp (2024)
programme.desc: Two estranged friends unveil a dangerous and deceptive plot that forever changes their lives.

programme.title: Our Kind of Traitor (2016)
programme.desc: A money launderer (Stellan Skarsgard) for Russian gangsters asks a couple vacationing in Marrakech, Morocco, to deliver incriminating evidence to an MI6 agent (Damian Lewis).

programme.title: Blink Twice (2024)
programme.desc: When tech billionaire Slater King meets Frida, he invites her to join him and his friends for a dream vacation on his private island. However, when strange things start to happen, shell have to uncover the truth if she hopes to make it out alive.

programme.title: Tom Clancys Without Remorse (2021)
programme.desc: Seeking justice for the murder of his pregnant wife, an elite Navy SEAL uncovers a covert plot that threatens to engulf the United States and Russia in an all-out war.

programme.title: Congo (1995)
programme.desc: Killer gorillas menace an ex-CIA agent (Laura Linney), a primatologist (Dylan Walsh) and others on a mission in Africa.

programme.title: Species (1995)
programme.desc: A scientist (Ben Kingsley) leads the hunt for a genetically engineered creature who morphs into a human blonde and tries to reproduce in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Species II (1998)
programme.desc: A half-alien female (Natasha Henstridge) escapes from a government compound to search for the half-alien male who has been raping and fatally impregnating women.

programme.title: Species III (2004)
programme.desc: An alien hybrid beauty (Sunny Mabrey) follows her overwhelming, but deadly, urge to mate while commandos hunt her down.

programme.title: Species: The Awakening (2007)
programme.desc: With help from her uncle, a woman (Helena Mattsson) who is a half-human, half-alien clone searches for the scientist who created her.

programme.title: Theres Something Wrong With the Children (2023)
programme.sub-title: Theres Something Wrong With the Children (2023)
programme.desc: Margaret and Ben take a weekend trip with two longtime friends and their two young children. Ben soon suspects something sinister is afoot when the kids start behaving strangely after disappearing into the woods overnight.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: Theres no topic off the table for Louis Katz as he spins his stories as a globe-trotting comedian into even more comedy gold.

programme.title: The Importance of Being Earnest (2002)
programme.desc: Complications arise after two bachelors (Rupert Everett, Colin Firth) make use of the same pseudonym in 19th-century England.

programme.title: The Alamo (1960)
programme.desc: Davy Crockett (John Wayne), Jim Bowie (Richard Widmark) and William Travis (Laurence Harvey) die defending the Texas fort against Mexican soldiers in 1836.

programme.title: Snack Shack (2024)
programme.desc: Best friends AJ and Moose seize the opportunity to run the local pools rundown snack shack. However, things take an unexpected turn when they meet Brooke, an effortlessly cool lifeguard who puts their big summer plans -- and friendship -- at risk.

programme.title: Run the Tide (2016)
programme.desc: When his drug-addicted mother leaves prison, a man (Taylor Lautner) kidnaps his younger brother (Nico Christou) and flees to the California coast for a better life.

programme.title: Heavens Gate (1980)
programme.desc: A well-educated marshal defends immigrant settlers against cattle barons in the 1890s Johnson County, Wyoming.

programme.title: The Fire Inside (2024)
programme.desc: The story of Claressa "T-Rex" Shields, a boxer from Flint, Mich., who trained to become the first woman in her countrys history to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.

programme.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance (2000)
programme.desc: A golf caddy (Will Smith) shows a disillusioned young war veteran (Matt Damon) how to master challenges and find meaning in life.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Guns Up (2025)
programme.desc: After a job goes horribly wrong, a man who moonlights as a mob henchman has one night to get his family out of the city while keeping his dark secret hidden.

programme.title: The Comeback Trail (2020)
programme.desc: Indebted to a mobster, a desperate producer tries to "accidentally" kill an aging movie star for an insurance scam. However, he soon begins to realize that the film theyre shooting is a masterpiece in the making.

programme.title: Serpico (1973)
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD.

programme.title: Defiance (2008)
programme.desc: In 1941 three refugee brothers (Daniel Craig, Liev Schreiber, Jamie Bell) turn a daily struggle to survive into a personal battle to save their people from the Nazis.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: Love and Monsters (2020)
programme.desc: A young man and his traveling companions battle an array of monsters during an 80-mile journey to find the woman he loves.

programme.title: Pixie (2020)
programme.desc: Pixie sets out to avenge her mothers death and attempts a heist that will give her the means to leave her small-town life behind. When the plan goes horribly wrong, shes forced to team up with a pair of misfits who are clearly in over their heads.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead (1999)
programme.desc: After too many years on the job, an EMS paramedic (Nicolas Cage) begins an emotional descent during 56-hour tour.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
programme.desc: Branded a traitor, an elite intelligence agent (Tom Cruise) investigates a failed Prague mission to retrieve a computer disk.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: The Mexican (2001)
programme.desc: A bungling gangster (Brad Pitt) must reform to please his girlfriend (Julia Roberts) but still has one last job to fulfill.

programme.title: Love, Sex, and Hollywood
programme.desc: Emilys catering gig leads to a job at a movie star Matthews talent agency, where she unexpectedly lands a TV role and skyrockets to fame. However, as romance blooms, disaster strikes when nude photos surface, threatening her career and his..

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
programme.desc: Branded a traitor, an elite intelligence agent (Tom Cruise) investigates a failed Prague mission to retrieve a computer disk.

programme.title: Grudge Match (2013)
programme.desc: A boxing promoter (Kevin Hart) offers two rival boxers (Robert De Niro, Sylvester Stallone) the chance to come out of retirement for one final bout.

programme.title: Dreamland (2019)
programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Murder Company (2024)
programme.desc: During the D-Day invasion, a group of U.S. soldiers must smuggle a member of the French resistance behind enemy lines to assassinate a high-value Nazi target.

programme.title: The Lookout (2007)
programme.desc: A brain-damaged former athlete (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) finds himself pulled into a heist at the bank where he works as a janitor.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: A detective (Samuel L. Jackson) and a narcotics cop (Vanessa L. Williams) track a sociopath out to kill a woman who can testify that he committed murder.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears (2002)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan (Ben Affleck) and the CIA director (Morgan Freeman) try to stop terrorists who are planning a nuclear attack.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.sub-title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he did not commit, a vengeful barber (Johnny Depp) and his accomplice (Helena Bonham Carter) carve up unlucky customers and bake them in meat pies.

programme.title: Shell (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to reclaim her career, once-beloved actress Samantha Lake gets drawn into the glamorous world of wellness mogul Zoe Shannon, only to uncover a monstrous truth beneath the seemingly flawless surface.

programme.title: Sinister (2012)
programme.desc: A true-crime novelist (Ethan Hawke) and his family become the targets of a supernatural entity when he uses found footage to unravel the murders of his homes previous occupants.

programme.title: Paid in Full (2002)
programme.desc: A dry cleaners delivery boy becomes one of the most powerful drug dealers in 1980s Harlem. Based on a true story.

programme.title: American Selfie: One Nation Shoots Itself
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi captures a snapshot of America as the country faces a pandemic, a presidential election and a costly financial collapse.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: In 1935 archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford), a lounge singer (Kate Capshaw) and a Chinese orphan (Ke Huy Quan) search for mystical stones stolen from an Indian tribe.
